comments.body: OMG, this looks worse than Java. Not your fault. We really need to relax our style guide for obvious cases.
Yeah, in cases like this I wish for var permission.
This would be a good place for a sanity check. Like `if (_mediaHeight <= 0.0) ...`

Can you please add a comment that explains why `--trace-startup` is needed just in case that someone is curious about why this error is printed out? A link to corresponding comments on the line 19 would be sufficient.

> Can you please add a comment that explains why `--trace-startup` is needed just in case that someone is curious about why this error is printed out? A link to corresponding comments on the line 19 would be sufficient.

Thanks.
Can I just add this comment. The comments are as follows:
"When run with --trace-startup, the VM stores trace events in an endless buffer instead of a ring buffer."
Orï¼Œjust link to line 19,  But I don't known how to add comment to link a line.
"When run with --trace-startup, the VM stores trace events in an endless buffer instead of a ring buffer." is great!

> "When run with --trace-startup, the VM stores trace events in an endless buffer instead of a ring buffer." is great!

Thanks.
Done.
